title: ISic001516. Epitaph for Euskia
body:
Facsimile Images

Εὐσκία ἡ ἄμ͡εν͡τος ζή͡σα(σα)
χρηστῶς καὶ σεμ͡ν͡ῶ͡ς ἔτη
πλῖο(ν) ἔλαττον κε´ ἀν͡ε-
παύσετο τ͡ῇ ἑορτ͡ῇ τ͡ῆ͡ς κυ-
5ρίας μου Λουκίας εἰς ἢ͡ν
οὔκ ἐστιν ἐν͡κώμ͡ειον
εἰπ͡εῖν χρηστειανή πι͡σ-
τή τέλιος οὖσα εὐχα-
ριστοῦσα τῷ εἰδίῳ ἀ͡ν-
10δρὶ πολλὰς εὐχαρισ-
τίας ((alpha)) ((⳨)) ((omega)) εὐομ͡ε͡ί[λητος]

Apparatus criticus

Text of Sgarlata 1998 controlled against photograph for detailing of ligatures

Italian translation

Euskia l'incensurabile, che visse onestamente e nobilmente anni piu' o meno 25, mori' nella festa della signora mia Lucia, per la quale non e' necessario pronunciare encomio. Cristiana fedele (e) perfetta, gradita al proprio marito per le (sue) molte grazie, affabile

commentary

Epitaph of Euskia, who died in the festival of Saint Lucia - for whose cult this is the earliest evidence (martyred c.304 AD).

  • Guarducci 1967-1978 4.526-528 no.4 fig.164 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000193
  • Pace 1949 15 fig.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001690
  • Feissel 1981 136 n.13 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002009
  • Sgarlata 1998 52-54 fig. 21 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002761
  • Sgarlata 2003 113-116 fig.69 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001584
  • Lamagna and Amato 2014 23 fig.7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001892
